game.title: The Lost City of Eldarath
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the Lost City of Eldarath
game.description: Rumors have been circulating about a lost city deep in the forest, filled with treasures and artifacts beyond your wildest dreams. Your quest is to retrieve an ancient relic said to be hidden within the city's walls.
game.reward: 1000 gold pieces, a magical amulet granting +10% intelligence

task.objective: Gather information about the Lost City of Eldarath from the local villagers
task.description: Talk to the villagers and gather any information they may have about the lost city, its location, and potential dangers.

task.objective: Navigate through the Darkforest to reach the Lost City of Eldarath
task.description: Make your way through the treacherous Darkforest, avoiding goblins and other dangers that lurk in the shadows.

task.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the heart of the Lost City of Eldarath
task.description: Bypass deadly traps and puzzles to reach the inner sanctum, where the ancient relic awaits.
